    • Method Detail

      • login

        public UserInfo login(UserLogIn user)
               throws org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException,
                      java.sql.SQLException,
                      java.lang.NumberFormatException
        Accesses the database and retrieves the user information from valid credentials are provided. User_Status column values are defined as follows:
        0: regular user (not admin), active
        1: admin user, active
        2: inactive user (will not appear in user table and user is unable to log in)
        Parameters:
        user - UserLogIn information
        Returns:
        UserInfo completely filled out if logged in. If not logged in, object parameters will be null except UserInfo.setLoggedIn(boolean) will be false
        Throws:
        org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.lang.NumberFormatException

      • addUser

        public StandardReturnObject addUser(UserSignUp user)
                             throws org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException,
                                    java.sql.SQLException,
                                    java.lang.Exception
        Accesses the database and signs up the user with the information provided.
        Parameters:
        user - UserSignUp information
        Returns:
        StandardReturnObject message/error message
        Throws:
        org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.lang.Exception

        public StandardReturnObject insertRequestForm(CompleteRequestForm form)
                                       throws org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException,
                                              java.sql.SQLException
        Accesses the database and inserts the complete item enrichment request form
        Parameters:
        form - CompleteRequestForm
        Returns:
        StandardReturnObject with no parameters filled out - calling function responsible for that.
        Throws:
        org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getItems

        public java.util.List<ItemInfo> getItems()
                                  throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                                         java.sql.SQLException,
                                         org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
        Accesses the database to retrieve all items' ids and names.
        Returns:
        A ArrayList of ItemInfo
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - When converting item id from String to int
        java.sql.SQLException - When traversing the returned rows
        org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - When running the SQL on the database

      • saveToFileSystem

        public void saveToFileSystem(java.lang.String filesystemPath,
                             java.lang.String fileName,
                             java.lang.String base64String)
                      throws java.io.IOException

        Parameters:
        filesystemPath -
        fileName -
        decodedImage -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getImageFromFileSystemAsBase64String

        public java.lang.String getImageFromFileSystemAsBase64String(java.nio.file.Path filePath)
                                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the image from the file system as a Base64 encoded string.
        You will need to add the base64 prefix before it will display: "data:image/jpg;base64," + base64EncodedString
        Parameters:
        filePath - Full path to image, including image name. Use Paths.get(HOMEPAGE_IMAGE_FOLDER_FIRST_PART, HOMEPAGE_IMAGE_FILE_NAME);
        Returns:
        Base64 encoded string without the prefix "data:image/jpg;base64,"
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When reading image from file system.

      • checkIsAdmin

        private boolean checkIsAdmin(java.lang.String userName)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Checks if the given username belongs to an admin user.
        Parameters:
        userName - The string username of the user to check.
        Returns:
        true if the username is an admin's username
        false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • usernameExists

        private boolean usernameExists(java.lang.String username)
        Accesses the database and returns whether the given username is taken by another user.
        Parameters:
        username - String username to check the existence of in the database.
        Returns:
        true if the username exists in the database, false otherwise

      • getUserDefaultPassword

        private java.lang.String getUserDefaultPassword(java.lang.String firstName,
                                                java.lang.String lastName)
        Returns a default password in the format of <lowercase first letter of first name><lowercase first 5 letters of last name>. Function String.toLowerCase() is used on both first and last names before getting the characters.
        Example: "John Doe" -> "jdoe"
        Example: "Keanu Reeves" -> "kreeve"
        Parameters:
        firstName - User first name
        lastName - User last name
        Returns:
        User default password as a string of length 6
